name: Cat's Life
description:
A game for the Secret Santa Game Jam about a person finding magical hot chocolate, and turning into a cat.

Credits: 

  • Cat Asset
  • Tile Palette and Virtual Guy (Pixel Adventure 1)
  • End Pillar
  • The In-Game Font
  • If you see your asset used in here, and I forgot to add it, please contact me (somehow)

My team from discord (not showing tags unless they ask me to):

  • Cheet - moral support (had trouble with opening unity lmao)
  • Orange (eggcellent) - Helped with level design
  • Rokage - Music guy
